add-control.select-blastbot: Select the Blastbot to which the control will be associated.
add-control.select-type: Select the kind of device that you would like to control, or create a blank control.
add-control.select-brand: Select the brand of your device.
add-control.position-instructions: Make sure that the device is off and is at line of sight of the Blastbot.
add-control.test-buttons: Try the buttons. If they don't work, press "Try another" until you find one that works. Once you find one that works, press "This works".
add-control.assure-ac-off: Make sure that the AC is off.
add-control.blastbot-disconnected-msg: The Blastbot "{{name}}" must be on and connected before adding a new control.
add-control.no-more-controls-msg: You can create a blank control and copy the codes from your original control.
add-control.type-not-found: Couldn't find any type matching the search terms.
add-control.brand-not-found: Couldn't find any brand matching the search terms.

change-password.bad-current-msg: The password could not be changed. make sure that the original password is correct.

control.edit-instructions: Select a button to edit, hold it pressed and slide to move.
control.no-communication: There is no communication with the Blastbot
control.check-blastbot-connected: Please make sure that the device "{{name}}" is correctly connected and configured.

delete-prompt.text: Are you sure you want to remove the button "{{name}}"?

history.no-enough-data: There isn't enough data to show
history.no-enough-data-msg: It may take some hours to appear

device.device-disconnected-msg: Please make sure that the device "{{name}}" is correctly connected and configured.

delete-prompt.title: Confirm remove

error.no-communication: THERE IS NO COMMUNUCATION WITH BLASTBOT BRIDGE

s1.title: Add a control
s1.p1: At the control list, press the plus icon (+) and select "Add Control".
s1.p2: Select the blastbot to which the control will be associated.
s1.p3: Select the type and brand of the device you want to control.
s1.p4: Follow the on screen instructions for testing available controls and selecting one that works.

s2.title: Edit or remove a control
s2.p1: At the control list, slide the control to the left for showing the options.

s3.title: Change the order of controls
s3.p1: At the control list, press the pencil icon.
s3.p2: Press on the three lines at the right of the control that you wish to move.
s3.p3: Slide the control to the desired place.

s1.title: Share a control
s1.p1: At the control list, slide the control to the right for revealing the share button.
s1.p3: Then, press the plus icon (+) and enter the email address registered in Blastbot Cloud to which you wish to share the control.

s1.title: Configuring a new Blastbot
s1.p1: Open the left side menu and select "Cofigure new Blastbot", then follow the on screen steps.

s1.title: Configuring a Blastbot again
s1.p1: Open the left side menu and select "Devices".
s1.p2: At the device list, slide the Blastbot to configure to the right and select "Configure Again".
s1.p3: Then, follow the on screen steps.

s1.title: Create a Task
s1.p1: Open the left side menu and select "Tasks".
s1.p3: Then, follow the on screen steps.

s2.title: Edit a Task
s2.p1: At the task list, slide the control to the left for showing the options.

s1.title: Create a Scene
s1.p1: At the control list, press the plus icon (+) and select "Add Scene".
s1.p2: Then, follow the on screen steps.

s2.title: Edit Scene
s2.p1: At the control list, press the pencil icon.

learn-code.instructions-1: Point your remote control towards the Blastbot.
learn-code.instructions-3: When a red light turns on in the Blastbot, press the desired button from the remote control to copy.
learn-code.instructions-4: Important: Press the button only once and don't hold it pressed.

rf.instructions-2: Make the RF control or device emit the signal to learn.

learn-code.error-3: There is no communication with the Blastbot

login.email-sent-msg: Please check your inbox for instructions for restoring your password
login.bad-account-msg: This Email is not in our database
login.email-exists-msg: Try recovering the password or using a different address
login.form-bad-email-msg: Must be a valid email address

scan-controls.instructions-1: Make sure that your AC is off.
scan-controls.instructions-2: Point the Blastbot towards the AC.
scan-controls.instructions-4: When you hear the AC turning on, immediately press "Stop Scan".

description.yearly: Each year the day {{day}} of {{month}} at {{hour}}:{{minutes}} ({{timezone}})

s1.title: Welcome to Blastbot!
s1.p1: You need a Blastbot for using this app, if you don't have one yet, you can get it here:

s2.title: All your controls in one app
s2.p1: With Blastbot you can control all your infrared remote controlled devices from your smartphone, no matter where you are.

s3.title: Program Tasks
s3.p1: With Tasks, you can set, for example, that the office's AC turns on at 8:00 and off at 18:00.

s4.title: Create scenes with your favorite settings
s4.p1: With Scenes, you can get ready for a movies night with a press of just one button.
s4.p2: Blastbot will turn the TV on, set your Home Theater and AC, and put your favorite channel on.

s5.title: Configure your Blastbot
s5.p1: First we need to configure your Blastbot and add all the controls you want.

setup-device.which-device-type: What type of device do you want to setup?
setup-device.blastbot-description: Control your AC and IR devices.
setup-device.switch-description: Replace the swithces in your wall.
setup-device.plug-description: Control your lamp, fan or any mains appliance.
setup-device.sensor-description: Get signals from alarm sensors and other devices.

setup-blastbot.blastbot-connection-lost-msg: Please make sure you are in range of your Blastbot before retrying or that it still has the green LED on.
setup-blastbot.no-blastbot-found-msg: Please make sure that you followed the previous instructions correctly.
setup-blastbot.no-networks: Couldn't get a list of networks.
setup-blastbot.no-internet-msg: Please make sure you are connected to a network with Internet access.
setup-blastbot.invalid-name-msg: The SSID must contain between 1 and 31 characters

s1.p1: Connect the Blastbot to the power.

s2.p1: Hold the configuration button pressed until the green LED stays on.

s3.p1: When the green LED stays on and still, press "Next".

s4.p1: Exit the app and go to the Wi-Fi configuration of your device.
s4.p2: Connect to a network called BlastbotXXXX (XXXX varies for each Blastbot).
s4.p3: Go back to this app, it will automatically connect to the Blastbot.

s5.p1: Select the name of the Wi-Fi network to which the Blastbot will be connected and enter its password. Finally press "Apply".

s1.p1: Connect the Blastbot Smart Plug to a free power receptacle.

s4.p2: Connect to a network called BlastbotPlugXXXX (XXXX varies for each Blastbot Smart Plug).

s5.p1: Select the name of the Wi-Fi network to which the Blastbot Smart Plug will be connected and enter its password. Finally press "Apply".

setup-blastbot-switch.blastbot-disconnected-msg: The Blastbot "{{name}}" must be on and connected before adding a new Blastbot Smart Switch.

s1.p1: Select the Blastbot Hub to which the Blastbot Smart Switch will be associated.

s2.p1: Make sure the Blastbot Smart Switch is correctly installed and is working by pressing the hardware buttons.

s3.p1: Hold pressed both hardware buttons (or, if there is only one, hold it firmly) until the white LEDs start blinking.

setup-rf-sensor.pairing-pir: Make the sensor detect movement by passing your hand in front of it...
setup-rf-sensor.pairing-door: Make the sensor detect opening by separing its parts...
setup-rf-sensor.pairing-button: Press the button in the RF device...

s1.p1: Select the Blastbot Hub to which the RF sensor will be associated.

s2.p1: Pair a RF sensor. For more information on how to do this, please read: What kind of sensors can I pair?

s3.instructions-pir:
1. Press "START PAIRING"
2. Make the sensor detect movement by passing your hand in front of it.
3. Check that is correctly pairing by repeating the action and making sure that the indicator is lit correspondingly.
s3.instructions-door:
1. Press "START PAIRING"
2. Make the sensor detect opening by separing its parts.
3. Check that is correctly pairing by repeating the action and making sure that the indicator is lit correspondingly.
s3.instructions-button:
1. Press "START PAIRING"
2. Press the button in the RF device.
3. Check that is correctly pairing by repeating the action and making sure that the indicator is lit correspondingly.
